item.title: Litecoin (LTC) Jumps By Over 5% With Strong Address Activity Before Halving | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Defying the consolidation in the broader cryptocurrency market, Litecoin (LTC) is once again making moves to the north. Over the last 24 hours, the LTC price is up by 5% shooting past $95. Over the last few weeks, Litecoin (LTC) has been showing good price action to the north as the most-awaited Litecoin halving event

item.title: Breaking: Coinbase Derivatives Exchange To Launch BTC, ETH Futures On June 5 | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Ashish Kumar
item.description:
Crypto News: Coinbase, the U.S. biggest crypto exchange on Thursday announced that its derivatives exchange, which is a CFTC regulated futures exchange, will launch Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) futures contracts on June 5. It added that these products will be available for the institutional investors. Also Read: Ripple Exec Marks This Crypto Hearing “Crucial”

The post Breaking: Coinbase Derivatives Exchange To Launch BTC, ETH Futures On June 5 appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Crypto News: Coinbase, the U.S. biggest crypto exchange on Thursday announced that its derivatives exchange, which is a CFTC regulated futures exchange, will launch Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) futures contracts on June 5. It added that these products will be available for the institutional investors. Also Read: Ripple Exec Marks This Crypto Hearing “Crucial”

item.title: Avalanche Hits 1M Monthly Active Users a Week After AvaCloud Went Live | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Popular blockchain platform Avalanche (AVAX) has reached a milestone of one million Monthly Active Users (MAU) about a week after the launch of AvaCloud Platform, its innovative cloud computing service. Interestingly, Ava Labs, the creator of Avalanche, believes the launch of AvaCloud has played a crucial role in the rapid growth of Avalanche’s user base.

The post Avalanche Hits 1M Monthly Active Users a Week After AvaCloud Went Live appeared first on CoinGape.

item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Thursday burned 1.04 billion LUNC tokens in the 10th batch of the LUNC burn mechanism. The total LUNC burned by the crypto exchange as part of its monthly burn mechanism reached almost 33 billion. Traders responded immediately to the latest burn by Binance and LUNC price jumped.
